full_text: Oh, this is just the most wonderful gift! Thank you so much, dear friend.
Thank you for the thoughtful gift. I truly appreciate it.
Well, isn't this an interesting gift. Thank you for thinking of me.
I'm afraid I don't quite know what to do with this. But thank you for the kind gesture.
I'm sorry, but I can't accept this. It goes against everything I believe in.
Ha! I never thought I'd see the day when someone actually got me a gift I love. Thanks!
I can always use another one of these. Thanks, I appreciate it.
Well, this is nice. Thanks for the gesture.
Thanks, but I don't think I'll be using this.
I can't believe you thought this would be a good idea. This is a waste of everyone's time.
Oh my gosh, this is the best gift ever! Thank you so much!
Wow, this is really cool! Thank you for thinking of me.
Oh, thank you for the gift. It's very nice.
Uh, this is not exactly what I was hoping for. But thank you anyways.
I don't like this at all. I'm sorry, I don't mean to be rude, it's just... bad.
Wow, this is the best! I'm gonna show my dad!
This is gonna be so much fun, thanks!
Uh, I don't really like this. Can I trade it?
Ew, this is gross! I don't want it!
Wow! This is somehow exactly what I need for my quest! You rock.
This is pretty cool. I'm sure I can find a use for this on my next adventure. Thanks!
Thanks for the gift, it's appreciated.
No thanks, that's not my speed.
Shocked and apalled that you would send this my way. Hard pass.
Warms my heart. Very kind soul.
Not good for me. Glad for your gesture.
Oh my! What a rare and treasured delicacy! You are a regnant among paupers.
Such consideration to have proffered a pearl such as this to a simple wordsmith such as I.
Is this what humans give each other as gifts? In that case it seems like a median examplar of its class.
This is neither suited to my purposes nor my interests.
I am wroth with disgust for this thing. On my home... city... this would portend a duel of honor.
Well, now that's a dang good gift! I'm much obliged, friend -- maybe I'll put in a good word for you!
Hey now, this is mighty nice of you. I appreciate the thought.
Well, that's right neighborly of you. I reckon I'll find somewhere to put this
Nice of you to think of me, but I don't reckon this particular thing will serve me awfully well
Whoa there! I reckon this ain't my cup of tea.
Well, I'll be damned. This is precisely what I needed. I owe you a debt.
A fine surprise, well chosen. You've earned yourself a credit in my book.
This is... unexpected. Yet not without its uses.
You tried, which I'm told counts for something.
Woohoohoo! This puts a spring in my step! If I were a cartoon I'd give you a big smooch right now.
Ha, good one! Thank you for thinking of me.
I didn't have my eyes peeled for this one, but I've got plenty of room in my burrows.
Don't worry about it pal, they can't all be winners.
Oooh... you my friend are a master of the mean prank.
Oh, this is just perfect! Thank you so much, it brings me a big bundle of joy!
What a thoughtful gift! I really appreciate it friend.
Thank you so much for thinking of me.
Thanks, but you know, next time you could give something like this to someone else who'd be better at appreciating it.
I'm sure you have some positive intent in giving this to me, and I'll just have to figure out what that is on my own.
Um, wow, this is amazing. Thank you so much!
I... appreciate this a lot. Sorry I'm awkward.
This is... fine I guess? Yeah, it's, uh, just fine.
Don't feel like you have to give me something everytime you see me. You can wait till you have something I'd like.
Gosh, I guess you don't know me very well... Sorry?
Hair of the Fathers! This is quite a fine thing. Bless you, little one.
This will further my existence nicely, little one.
I will accept this, if you insist, little one.
Really? Perhaps some would find use for such an object, little one. Perhaps.
What an odious speck of creation you've thrust upon me, little one.
This is, hands down, the absolute best thing we've ever seen. We love it!
We're not gonna mince words here: we're pleased as punch.
Well this sure is... unique. We can always use more of... whatever this thing is.
Look, we think you're great, even though this... thingamajig here... isn't. No sweat, alright?
How did you even find something this awful? Wowie zowie, we're getting chills from how terrible this thing is, yeesh!
Ohoho, this is fantastic! I'm going to make a special meal tonight to celebrate!
I might be a half-dead zombie, but I know good taste when I see it, and pal you got it. Thanks.
Not my favorite, but hey, it doesn't bother me. Keep on shining you crazy diamond.
Woof, what were you thinking? I mean... clearly bad, this thing, okay?
You're lucky I only eat fish nowadays, or else I'd tell you to start running.
I love it! You're a friend of the dwarves and a friend of mine.
See this? This is what we need more of in this world. Thank you.
I appreciate it, even if I don't appreciate it a lot.
I'm kind of busy, could you leave that next to the door on your way out?
I'm kind of busy, could you throw that down the nearest mineshaft and toss a stick of dynamite in after it?
Excellence rating: 100%! I'm supremely overjoyed. I encourage you to continue your current set of behaviors.
Excellence rating: 80%. I'm moderately overjoyed. I encourage you to employ a mixed strategy of exploiting analogous gifts and exploring gift space for further improvements.
Excellence rating: 50%. I'm neither over- nor under-joyed. I encourage you to experiment with different resource extraction paradigms in order to acquire better gift material.
Excellence rating: 0%. I'm moderately underjoyed. I encourage you to cease and desist giving analogous gifts and instead give only disanalogous gifts.
Excellence rating: negative 100%. I'm supremely underjoyed. I discourage you from giving gifts in any form now and forever.
